content.value: After several iterations, we are now at the current state of my website. The previous iteration contained a "blog" of sorts (with two total posts) and was written completely in HTML/CSS. This time around, I decided to take a different route and create this via GatsbyJS. It's now far easier for me to add to different sections to my website, create posts, etc., and overall I think this means that I (hopefully) won't need to completely rewrite the site like I have each time I decided to change things up.

My only real goal is to write a bit about my life with a focus on software development and books (I'm an avid reader). I'm also passionate about music, sports, and finance, but including those as possible topics broadens the scope a bit too much for my liking. Anyways, here's to me writing more consistently and to more pics of my pup.
